item.title: Privacy
item.description: I read this article today in which Google stated that it would “wipe user location history for visits to healthcare clinics, domestic violence shelters” with the following text as an example: Suppose the company’s systems detect a visit to places including medical facilities, counseling centers, domestic violence shelters, abortion and fertility clinics, or addiction treatment centers. In that case, Fitzpatrick says, “we will delete these entries from Location History soon after they visit.
